i.name: Headshot
i.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

q.name: Piltover Peacemaker
q.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

w.name: Yordle Snap Trap
w.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.

e.name: 90 Caliber Net
e.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.

r.name: Ace in the Hole
r.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.

riot.name: Headshot
riot.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

i1.name: Headshot
i1.blurb: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Caitlyn's''' non-empowered basic attacks generate a stack of ''Headshot'', doubled when attacking from {{tip|brush}}. At 6 stacks, '''Caitlyn's''' next [[basic attack]] shoots a projectile after a {{pp|13|type='''bonus''' attack speed|color=attack speed|0.3 to 0.1|key1=%|0 to 300|formula=0.3-0.1 every 100% '''bonus''' attack speed. ''Numbers estimated.''}} second delay, dealing {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|50 to 100|1 to 13}}|ad}} {{as|(+ 125% {{critical damage|62.5}} critical strike chance)|critical chance}} {{as|AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}, increased to {{as|100% {{As|(+ 125% {{critical damage|62.5}} critical strike chance)|critical chance}} AD}} against non-champions.
i1.description2: Enemies {{tip|root|rooted}} by {{ai|Yordle Snap Trap|Caitlyn}} or {{tip|slow|slowed}} by {{ai|90 Caliber Net|Caitlyn}} grant an additional ''headshot'' at {{sti|range|1300 range}}.
notes: * The additional on-hits from {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} and {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} do not grant additional stacks of ''Headshot''.
* The bonus range from {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} will not have any effect during {{ai|Yordle Snap Trap|Caitlyn|trap}} and {{ai|90 Caliber Net|Caitlyn|net}} extended ''Headshot'' attacks.
* As with most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from ''Headshot'' will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
* Attacking wards will still generate stacks towards ''Headshot'' but empowered attack will not be consumed.
* The basic attack triggering ''Headshot'' can {{tip|Critical Strike|critically strike}}, but ''Headshot's'' damage remains unchanged if it does.
* The empowered basic attack is considered an ability and will thus fire after the cast time even if '''Caitlyn''' is {{tip|stun|stunned}} or {{tip|stasis|stasised}}.

riot.name: Piltover Peacemaker
riot.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
riot.tooltip:
Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a narrow piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. After hitting any target, it opens into a wider shot that deals {{ e2 }}% less damage.

Always deals full damage to trap revealed targets.

q1.name: Piltover Peacemaker
q1.blurb: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After 1 second, '''Caitlyn''' fires a projectile in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy it passes through, after which it expands in width but deals only 60% damage to all enemies it passes through thereafter.
q1.description2: Enemies {{tip|sight|revealed}} by {{ai|Yordle Snap Trap|Caitlyn}} always take full damage from ''Piltover Peacemaker''.
notes: * Enemies hit while protected by a {{tip|spell shield}} will still be considered when calculating damage for subsequent hits.

riot.name: Yordle Snap Trap
riot.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
riot.tooltip:
Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for {{ e6 }} seconds and granting True Sight for a short duration.

Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds. {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once.

Trapped enemies take an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) increased damage from Headshot.

label: Bonus Headshot Damage on Trapped Targets
Bonus Attack Damage Ratio
Recharge Time
Maximum Traps
Trap Duration

w1.name: Yordle Snap Trap
w1.blurb: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Caitlyn''' periodically stores a charge of ''Yordle Snap Trap'', up to a maximum amount stored at once.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Caitlyn''' sets a trap at the target location that arms after {{fd|1.1}} seconds and lasts for a duration. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.
w1.description3: Enemy champions that walk into a trap are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which they are {{tip|true sight|revealed}} for 3 seconds, take additional damage from {{ai|Headshot|Caitlyn}}, and become immune to ''Yordle Snap Traps'' for 4 seconds while they remain in the area.
notes: * Traps grant a brief area of sight upon being placed.
** Traps are visible on the map.
* {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} deal increased damage '''after''' critical modifier.

riot.name: 90 Caliber Net
riot.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
riot.tooltip: Fires a net, knocking Caitlyn backwards. The net deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and slows the first enemy hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second.

e1.name: 90 Caliber Net
e1.blurb: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Caitlyn''' fires a net and {{tip|dash|recoils}} 400 units in the opposite direction, dealing {{as|{{tip|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% for 1 second.
notes: * The knockback can be used to pass through terrain.
* Unlike similar abilities ({{ai|Rocket Jump|Tristana}}, {{ai|Arcane Shift|Ezreal}}, etc.) ''90 Caliber Net'' has a short [[channel]] (rather than a cast time) making it interruptable.

riot.name: Ace in the Hole
riot.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
riot.tooltip:
Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to {{ castrange }} range. The shot deals {{ rtotaldamage }} physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.

Grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

r1.name: Ace in the Hole
r1.blurb: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a brief delay, '''Caitlyn''' locks onto a target enemy champion and {{tip|channels}} for 1 second, gaining {{tip|true sight}} of the target.
r1.description2: Once '''Caitlyn''' completes the channel, she fires a homing projectile toward the target that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy champion it hits.
r1.description3: ''If the target dies during the channel the ability is cancelled and put on a 5-second cooldown without refunding the mana cost.''
notes: * If Caitlyn loses sight of her target before she locks on, the ability cancels but does not go on cooldown or consume any mana.
* [[Champion summoned units#Decoys|Decoys]] will intercept the missile.
* If the target dies after the bullet has been fired the shot will continue towards their corpse and may still hit other champions.
